metadata.title: Savlo — Simple, Secure Financing for Small Businesses
metadata.description: Savlo connects small businesses to trusted financing partners. Quick applications, clear terms, and dashboard tracking. Start with 14-day free access.

hero.headline: Unlock Financing That Actually Fits Your Business
hero.subtext: Savlo connects your business to verified lenders and financing products — fast, clear, and secure.
hero.description: Apply online and track progress from your own dashboard.

steps.title: Upload your documents.

steps.title: Track progress.
steps.description: Follow each application from submission to payout.

howItWorks.microcopy: No hidden fees. No guesswork. Real updates in your dashboard.

products.heading: Products built for real business needs

items.title: BPKB Financing
items.description: Quick loans secured by vehicle ownership (BPKB). Fast turnaround for urgent cash needs.

items.title: Property Financing
items.description: Access up to 65% of your property value (max IDR 5B). Clear terms, straightforward steps.

items.title: AP Invoice Financing
items.description: Finance payables to keep suppliers paid — up to IDR 2B. Short application, quick payout.

items.title: AR Invoice Financing
items.description: Convert receivables into working capital — up to IDR 5B. Smooth approvals for qualified invoices.

items.title: Savlo+ (Ecosystem Program)
items.description: For businesses that need a custom approach — priority access and personalized support.
